meanings.sent1: The sky was clear and smogless after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The park was a smogless oasis in the bustling city.
meanings.sent3: The smogless morning air felt refreshing on my face.
meanings.sent4: Her smogless smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The smogless horizon stretched out before us, promising a clean day ahead.

meanings.sent1: The smogless factory used eco-friendly technology.
meanings.sent2: Electric cars are a great example of smogless transportation.
meanings.sent3: The smogless chimney made the neighbors jealous.
meanings.sent4: His smogless actions helped protect the environment.
meanings.sent5: The smogless engine ran silently, leaving no pollution behind.
